alt_text_generation.name: Alt Text Generation
alt_text_generation.description: Generate descriptive alt text for images
alt_text_generation.template:
Generate SEO-optimized alt text for images in this {{resourceType}}:

Image Context:
- Product/Content: {{productName}}
- Image Description: {{imageDescription}}
- Image Type: {{imageType}} (main, lifestyle, detail, etc.)
- Visible Elements: {{visibleElements}}
- Context: {{context}}

SEO Context:
- Target Keywords: {{keywords}}
- Category: {{category}}
- Brand: {{brand}}

Alt Text Requirements:
- Maximum 125 characters
- Descriptive and specific
- Include relevant keywords naturally
- Accessible for screen readers
- Avoid "image of" or "picture of"
- Be specific about what's shown

For each image, provide:
1. Optimized alt text
2. Character count
3. Keywords included
4. Accessibility score (1-10)
5. SEO value score (1-10)
6. Alternative versions

Format as JSON array with detailed analysis for each alt text option.

bulk_optimization.name: Bulk Content Optimization

conservative.name: Conservative
conservative.description: Safe, minimal changes that preserve existing content

balanced.name: Balanced
balanced.description: Moderate optimization with good balance of preservation and improvement

aggressive.name: Aggressive
aggressive.description: Significant changes for maximum SEO impact

creative.name: Creative
creative.description: Innovative approaches with creative content generation

fallback_prompts.generic_optimization: Optimize this content for SEO while maintaining readability and brand consistency.
fallback_prompts.error_handling: Please analyze the provided content and suggest improvements based on SEO best practices.
fallback_prompts.minimal_context: Improve the SEO value of this content with the available information.
